Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: I've told you all I know. Now please excuse me.
The Factor had a good amount of business to attend to today. I believe he's.... ah, he's out looking at prospective expansion sites today.
Somewhere on the Eastern Coast of the island, I think. East of that big rock arch, you know, the one with the tomb at the base?
Factor Magius had quite a bit to do today. I believe he was headed out to location of that awful shipwreck that happened recently.
Maybe you can catch him on the way?
Let's see. He had quite a busy schedule for today. I believe he's out at Brodir Grove, looking at potential sites for expanding Raven Rock.
Perhaps you can catch him there?

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
set fbmwCO9.Carniusloc to 3
setstage fbmwCO9 20
fbmwCarniusMagiuscoveREF.Enable
fbmwImperialGuardCarn3REF.Enable

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You disappointed me, outlander. I thought you could get the job done.
You didn't make it? I trusted you, outlander!.... I can't allow you to remain employed if I can't count on you to get the job done.
You're fired, and I probably will be before long, too.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
setstage fbmwCO9 110
fbmwCarniusMagiusDefREF.enable
set fbmwCO9.Carniusloc to 4

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: I'm sure Carnius didn't think you'd get it there on time. I'm glad you proved him wrong.
You got it to him on time? Excellent. I was sure he created that deadline out of spite, never intending my report to get to him before it expired.
You've done good work, outlander. You've bought us some more time.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
setstage fbmwCO9 60
player.additem 0000000f 1000
fbmwCarniusMagiusDefREF.enable
fbmwImperialGuardCarn2REF.Disable
fbmwCarniusMagiusShipREF.Disable
fbmwCarniusMagiuscoveREF.Disable
fbmwImperialGuardCarn3REF.Disable
fbmwImperialGuardCarn1REF.Disable
fbmwCarniusMagiusarchREF.Disable

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: It needs to be in Carnius' hands in five hours, and you're going to get it to him. Don't let me down.
It never made it to the fort, and Tirvel never returned....  I don't know what happened.
I have someone else taking care of it. Don't worry yourself about it.
Yeah, how did you know? I'm supposed to take this to the Fort, but..... but I don't really want to go.
There's wolves and bears and things out there, you know? I'd feel much safer if I had an escort. Do you think maybe you'd go with me?
I do need to get there soon.
I've placed some rather impossible demands on Falco lately, with the intention of his failing to meet them.
When he does, it will erode confidence in the chain of command for the colony, and help convince the investors to pull out.
One of those demands has been to deliver status reports. I'm concerned that one may make it through. Meet Hroldar in the courtyard, and follow him.
Then go collect the messenger, and make sure he meets Hroldar as well, if you understand me...
I don't have time to explain. Just take it and get going. Head straight for his office at the fort; don't waste time doing anything else. Now go!

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
player.additem 0bkUcolonyreport 1
setstage fbmwCO9 10
set fbmwCO9.timer to 18000
fbmwCarniusMagiusDefREF.disable

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: I'm afraid you've missed the deadline. What a pity, both for you and for Falco. Now, I've work to do, so I suggest you just run along...
I'm afraid you've missed the deadline. What a pity, both for you and for Falco. Now, I've work to do, so I suggest you just run along...
You already delivered the report.
Hrmph. Well. I must say, I'm surprised - I didn't expect to see this report on time. Very well. Let Falco know I've received it.
The report didn't matter. It was the messenger I was concerned with.
I don't need the report. In fact, it's better if I don't have it. I just want to make sure it doesn't reach this fort. Are we clear?

I've placed some rather impossible demands on Falco lately, with the intention of his failing to meet them. When he does, it will erode confidence in the chain of command for the colony, and help convince the investors to pull out.
One of those demands has been to deliver status reports. I'm concerned that one may make it through. Meet Hroldar in the courtyard, and follow him.
Then go collect the messenger, and make sure he meets Hroldar as well, if you understand me...
